did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physloc: Library of Virginia. Some records in this collection may be located at the State Record Center. Contact Archives Research Services for access information direction and hours.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Highland County (Va.) Records, 1862-1944 (1862-1885 bulk). Local Government Records Collection, Highland County County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in a shipment of court records from Highland County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Highland County was named for its mountainous terrain. It was formed from Bath and Pendleton (West Virginia) Counties in 1847.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Highland County (Va.) Records, 1862-1944 (1862-1885 bulk), include various records from the following series: Bonds/Commissions/Oaths, Election Records, Circuit Court Records, Fiduciary Records, Land Records, Tax and Fiscal Records, Town Records, and Miscellaneous Records

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Highland County Records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult "A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm" found on the Library of Virginia's web site.

scopecontent.p: Records, List of Officers, School Trustee Oaths, Abstract Vote, Electoral Board, Notice of Candidacy, Report of Business in the Court.
List of Officers, School Trustee Oaths, Abstract Vote, Electoral Board, Notice of Candidacy Report of Business in the Court.
Appraisement and Sale Bills, State Personal Property Interrogatories, Tax Ticket, Papers, Estrays, List of Officers Meadowell Cheese Factory.
Physicians' Register, also List of Road Workers and Minutes of the Board of Supervisors.
Chancery causes, judgment accounts, deeds, town of Monterey correspondence
